item.title: 'Drill, baby, drill' - At the RNC as Trump charmed crowd
item.description: The BBC's Kayla Epstein watched on as Donald Trump addressed his supporters in Milwaukee.

item.title: Putin Counted on Waning U.S. Interest in Ukraine. It Might Be a Winning Bet.
item.description: The arc of American foreign policy could be moving closer to the Russian president’s view of it. But he has been wrong before about the U.S.

item.title: Russian Court to Deliver Verdict on Evan Gershkovich, Wall Street Journal Reporter
item.description: The case against him has been repeatedly denounced by his employer, The Wall Street Journal, and the United States, but a verdict could set the stage for a prisoner exchange.

item.title: Israel says Gaza war winding down despite rise in deadly civilian strikes
item.description: Palestinians and humanitarian workers have said the wave of recent attacks are similar in intensity and lethality to those in the early weeks of the war.

item.title: Yemen’s Houthis claim deadly drone attack on Tel Aviv
item.description:
Israeli military steps up air patrols after explosion in central Tel Aviv, killing a man in his 50s

  • Israel-Gaza war – live updates

Yemen’s Houthi rebels have claimed responsibility for a drone explosion over central Tel Aviv in the early hours of Friday that struck buildings, leaving one person dead.

The Israeli military said it believed the drone was Iranian-made and launched from Yemen.

Continue reading...
